danfulea.phys.egs

Class EGS4Grid

  • java.lang.Object
    • danfulea.phys.egs.EGS4Grid

  • public class EGS4Grid
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for output results. Based on EGS4/EGSnrc routines developed by SLAC(Stanford Linear Accelerator Center)/NRC (National Research Council of Canada).
    Author:
    Dan Fulea, 22 NOV. 2005

    • Method Detail

      • MATERIALGRID

        public static void MATERIALGRID(int NRADIAL,
                                int NDEPTH,
                                double[][] MASSVOL,
                                int MORV,
                                double[] ECUTS,
                                double[] PCUTS,
                                double[] RCYL,
                                double[] ZPLANE,
                                int[] MED,
                                java.lang.String[] MEDIA)
        This routine provides a material grid output.
        Parameters:
        NRADIAL - NRADIAL : number of radial results to display
        NDEPTH - NDEPTH : number of depth results to display
        MASSVOL - MASSVOL : array of the masses, or volumes for each region
        MORV - MORV: 1 for mass, 2 for volume.
        ECUTS - the 'ECUT' array
        PCUTS - the 'PCUT' arrays
        RCYL - RCYL : array of outer boundaries of each radial bin (1st radius=0)
        ZPLANE - ZPLANE : array of depth boundaries (1st plane not always=0)
        MED - MED : array of the medium numbers for each IRL.
        MEDIA - MEDIA : array of medium names.

      • MKGRID

        private static void MKGRID(int[] MED,
                           java.lang.String[] MEDIA,
                           java.lang.String[] CDSTBL,
                           java.lang.String[] CTRTBL,
                           java.lang.String[] CABSRB)
        Internally used. It outputs a grid of values. Called by MATERIALGRID.
        Parameters:
        MED - MED
        MEDIA - MEDIA
        CDSTBL - CDSTBL
        CTRTBL - CTRTBL
        CABSRB - CABSRB

      • ZONEGRID

        public static void ZONEGRID(int NRADIAL,
                            int NDEPTH,
                            int NRMIN,
                            int NZMIN,
                            int NZ)
        This routine provides a generalized grid output.
        Parameters:
        NRADIAL - NRADIAL : number of radial results to display
        NDEPTH - NDEPTH : number of depth results to display
        NRMIN - NRMIN : index of min radius of results zone
        NZMIN - NZMIN : index of min Z plane of results zone
        NZ - NZ : total number of slabs in the geometry

      • MKGRIDZ

        private static void MKGRIDZ(int NRMIN,
                            int NZMIN,
                            int NZ,
                            double[][][] RESULTS,
                            double[][][] UNCRT)
        Internally used. Called by ZONEGRID.
        Parameters:
        NRMIN - NRMIN
        NZMIN - NZMIN
        NZ - NZ
        RESULTS - RESULTS
        UNCRT - UNCRT
